SELECT o.order_seq, o.order_date, d.prod_title, p.pay_total_money as total_cost FROM pay as p, order_list as o , delivery as d WHERE o.order_seq = p.order_seq AND o.order_seq = d.order_seq AND o.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT o.order_date, o.order_status, o.order_seq, d.delivery_seq, d.receiver_name, d.receiver_phone1, d.receiver_phone2, d.receiver_zipcode, d.receiver_address1, d.receiver_address2, d.receiver_memo, p.prod_title_image, p.prod_title, op.prod_amount, p.prod_price_sale, p.prod_point, d.delivery_state FROM order_list AS o, delivery AS d, product AS p, order_prod AS op WHERE o.order_seq = d.order_seq AND o.order_seq = op.order_seq AND op.prod_code = p.prod_code AND o.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT o.order_date, o.order_seq, u.user_name FROM order_list AS o, user_member AS u WHERE u.user_id = o.user_id AND o.order_seq = #{order_seq} AND o.user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT * FROM delivery WHERE order_seq = #{order_seq} AND user_id = #{user_id}
